text: Sure, I am not rooting for any specific parametrization notation. Just wanted to know where current comes from and realized how much I am attached to what I grew up with. I suspect such attachment in other cultures but of course from mathematics point of view it does not matter, however people many times rely on such hooks to ease reasoning in complex situations.
